product_name: Mario BadescuFacial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea
summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Facial Spray With Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea invigorates dull, tired skin with an infusion of botanical extracts and cucumber and peppermint essential waters. This facial mist delivers a cooling boost of hydration that leaves skin feeling refreshed and revitalized.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-purpose mistRefreshing, Cucumber and Green Tea fragranceWakes up dull, tired skin with refreshing, antioxidant-enriched hydrationGives skin a cooling, Peppermint-infused boostLeaves skin dewy and invigoratedItem 2515878How To UseMist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.#MBSkinTip: Mario Badescu Facial Sprays are meant to multi-task! Use it to before moisturizer to boost hydration, to dampen makeup brushes and sponges, as a final step after makeup application to give your look a dewy finish, and to refresh your face (and mood!) throughout the dayIngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Propylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Water, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus (Bladderwrack) Extract, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzophenone-4, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.#MBSkinTip: Mario Badescu Facial Sprays are meant to multi-task! Use it to before moisturizer to boost hydration, to dampen makeup brushes and sponges, as a final step after makeup application to give your look a dewy finish, and to refresh your face (and mood!) throughout the day

reviews.headline: Stanks, But Works
reviews.comments: smells really bad, but works good! don't use if you have acne prone skin

reviews.headline: Just.. wow
reviews.comments: Recently purchased this for the first time since i was in 8th grade (I am 22 now) back than, i used the lavander one which was just OK- the smell was not nearly as pleasant as i find the cucumber aloe one to be. Smells amazing, moistures and soothes skin and just makes me feel nice!

reviews.headline: Just.. wow
reviews.comments: Recently purchased this for the first time since i was in 8th grade (I am 22 now) back than, i used the lavander one which was just OK- the smell was not nearly as pleasant as i find the cucumber aloe one to be. Smells amazing, moistures and soothes skin and just makes me feel nice!

reviews.headline: Smells Good and Very Useful
reviews.comments: Thought I would end up regretting buying this and not end up using it, but I was wrong. I use this for many things. As a step before removing my makeup. As a step before putting on the dew cream. To freshen my makeup. To soothe my scalp. To refresh my face. To smell good. To hydrate my hands and feet. I bought the 3 bottle set. Each has a light and not overwhelming scent. This didn't irritate my skin. Money not wasted after all.

reviews.headline: Mario Badescu - in "colors" green & purple
reviews.comments: Honestly I have tried both of the Mario Badescu's facial sprays in the "colors" I will say green & purple & I love them both very much! My favorite was the green with the aloe, cucumber, & green tea. It was very awakening, refreshing, & smelled a very light nice fresh scent. Also the purple one is very good too! They both hydrate your skin very much & give you "that glow". Would definetly purchase this product again.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!
reviews.comments: Will definitely buy again. This has soothed and cleared my skin so much. It sets my makeup and is great smelling & refreshing

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!
reviews.comments: Will definitely buy again. This has soothed and cleared my skin so much. It sets my makeup and is great smelling & refreshing

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: One of my favorites

reviews.headline: awful!!
reviews.comments: dont get this it burns ur face and leaves red spots

reviews.headline: awful!!
reviews.comments: dont get this it burns ur face and leaves red spots

reviews.headline: I definitely will give this another spin
reviews.comments: I'm not a person who wear makeup but I do dab a little on imperfection areas. However, this spray just balance everything out and make your face look more alive. I mean who wants to look like they had a rough night? Maybe it's all in my head but I like the spray

reviews.headline: Great on Aging Hair
reviews.comments: I have aging, wavy/curly hair that tends to be frizzy and is drying with age. I had a sample bottle of this spray, and tried it on my hair on a whim. Sprayed it on, and lightly worked it through with my fingers. Works better than many products I've tried for my hair type, without alcohol and other harsh ingredients.  I'm buying a full-sized bottle.

reviews.headline: Probably the best and only facial spray I can say that about
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of facial sprays way more expensive with more ingredients for some reason this one really works for me not sure because there's so many other facial sprays or toners but this really works

reviews.headline: Great facial spray
reviews.comments: I use this spray before applying serums and moisturizer then apply after. One of the best facial sprays to have that make your skin feel Great.

reviews.headline: buy this!!
reviews.comments: I love this product. it is lightweight and refreshing! have re purchased multiple times

reviews.headline: AHHHHHHH
reviews.comments: Makes my dry skin feel amazing!

reviews.headline: I will always love this product
reviews.comments:
Omg I have owned so many of these sprays and I truly love them first thing is the smell makes me so relaxed it just smells amazing second is it has improved my skin so much and gives you that glowy finish 
Cucumber spray: you can use this spray anytime cause it just gives those anytime vibes
Lavender spray: I love using it a night cause it just gives the vibes 
Rose spray:  love using it at Morning cause it also gives the vibes and u can use it as a setting spray 
Orange spray: u should use it at morning cause it gives you that energized feel

reviews.headline: Sunburn cure!
reviews.comments: I actually got this product a while ago and used it as a "refreshing" spray foe the skin. I didnt notice much but still liked the cold, clean feeling. Recently I got a horrible sunburn and decided to try it out on the burn. By the next morning my skin felt insanely better!

reviews.headline: THIS SPRAY IS AMAZING!!ü©∑
reviews.comments: I Loveeee this spray it is SO hydrating!! Also it works VERY WELL as a setting spray I put it on after my makeup, and my makeup stayed on ALL day! And it gave my makeup the PERFECT dewy look I wanted. I ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND!!üíùüíù

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I have been using these facial sprays for years and absolutely love them.  I would be hard pressed to say which herbal combination I like best.  They are all wonderful, and I rotate the different ones - though I do have a different one in each bathroom.

faceoff_positive.comments: Such an exciting and innovative product!  To respond to the review saying Peppermint is extremely damaging to the face - that would be if this product included Peppermint Essential Oil.  Which it does not.  Peppermint Leaf Water is completely different, and in this case is included most likely for its moisturizing properties.  All in all, another win from MB!
faceoff_positive.headline: so excited!

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this spray! It smelled great and perked up my skin. I really thought I found a replacement for the Rosewater spray (which I love.) Unfortunately, my sensitive skin did not take very well to this spray. I ended up with an allergic reaction after applying it. I would say to take my review with a grain of salt. I have very sensitive skin that reacts to many ingredients commonly found in skincare and makeup so if you don't have finicky skin like mine, you will most likely love this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sad to say I'm returning this...
